content.raw:
I suspect there's a problem in `default` caused by [this line](#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-cmake/src/3629811d05b872b3d98f1937694984b9a6cc600e/cmake/IgnConfigureBuild.cmake?at=default&fileviewer=file-view-default#IgnConfigureBuild.cmake-140) in Ignition CMake.

`ign-launch0` does have a `src` directory and that’s probably why Ignition CMake was happy. That makes me think either:

a\) We need to fix Ignition CMake or Ignition Launch in `default`.

b\) We're using the wrong Ignition Launch branch here and the good one is `ign-launch0`.
content.html:
I suspect there's a problem in default caused by this line in Ignition CMake.

ign-launch0 does have a src directory and that’s probably why Ignition CMake was happy. That makes me think either:

a) We need to fix Ignition CMake or Ignition Launch in default.

b) We're using the wrong Ignition Launch branch here and the good one is ign-launch0.
